title: (x) Della Notte logo - Mason Serif {Yves}
content:
Anyone? Anyone? Bueller?

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Logo Text.jpg](http://web.archive.org/system/files?file=Logo%20Text.jpg) | 45.56 KB |
author: chris82080

comments.content: I thought so: they [customised the capital N](http://web.archive.org/web/20050830013424/http:/www.fontshop.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=catalog.fontdetail&displayfontid=E.7077.2.2&attributes.sampleSize=48&sampleText=Della+Notte&sampleSize=48).

\>Who’s Bueller?

Chris is making reference to [Ferris Bueller’s Day Off](http://web.archive.org/web/20050830013424/http:/www.imdb.com/title/tt0091042/) in particular, one of Ben Stein’s lines in his performance as a ridiculously boring economics teacher.

“something…d-o-o economics… anyone…. anyone.. beu-ller?”

(i know this isn’t type related, but it’s so seldom i get to post anything..)
